main event: A visual observation of a weird vapor trail that was believed to be caused by a missile launched from the Pacific missile range.
interesting points: The sighting occurred approximately 50 miles WNW of the observer., The vapor trail appeared stationary and inclined vertically., The observation was made from the corner of Beverly and Vermont in Los Angeles., The weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility., The timing of the observation coincided with the launch of a missile at 1435.
